Name: Just Sign!
About the game: Just Sign! is an action tower defense 1-4 players game, where you build your turrets. Go through various maps and defend contracted items! Game fully supports local and online play with gamepads and split keyboard. Refine, craft, build, reload Get resources, refine and combine them to craft different turrets to counter enemies. But there is still one problem, turrets can't shoot without ammo! You have to constantly build new turrets and reload them in a dynamic spin on tower defense. 30 maps Fight the kraken, zombies, spaceships, flying whales and more! Dynamic maps Maps are dynamic! Avoid traffic, falling rocks, oncoming minecarts, get on top of trucks! Local / online gameplay Gather your friends and play together up to 4 players on the same couch or over the internet. Gamepads and split keyboard are supported. Solo mode Every map supports challenging solo mode.
